sub_title: Independend  Consultant for Legal & Commercial Services
summary:
Dutch National, Master at Law. Retired from Royal Dutch Shell in June 2016. Senior professional with commercial acumen and all-round international expertise in the upstream oil & gas industry.  After private practise enjoyed an international career with Shell in positions. Involved in all relevant aspects of upstream operations and new business development, notably in Europe, Middle East, Russia, CIS and Asia. 
Key skills/strengths: 
•	Cultural awareness: Dutch by birth, open mind, also lived in Oman, Iran, Dubai and Russia
•	Leadership: authenticity, compassion and drive with emphasis on development and delivery
•	Interpersonal and negotiating: Lead Negotiator for various Russian, ME and CIS deals
•	Commercial: VP commercial ME/CIS/Russia and leading commercial teams
•	Risk management: Joint Ventures: design, financing, execution, management and disputes
•	Compliance: setting up and implementing compliance programs (FCPA, US and EU sanctions)
